entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
